description: Cody was kicking back with all the other models that were in town for our most recent shoot. Everyone was discussing what was for dinner except for Cody, who was thumbing through a porn-mag, talking about all the dirty things that he'd do to the sex-nymphs.When he excused himself to go to the bathroom, Samuel followed him up the stairs. After some convincing, Cody leans against the wall, pulls out his cock and lets Samuel go to town on it.When it's all said and done, both of these studs have gotten off, and they're ready for dinner.
title: Horny Cody Cummings gets his dick sucked
